original_title: The Four Skulls of Jonathan Drake
overview: Jonathan Drake, while attending his brother's funeral, is shocked to find the head of the deceased is missing. When his brother's skull shows up later in a locked cabinet, Drake realizes an ancient curse placed upon his grandfather by a tribe of South American Jivaro Indians is still in effect and that he himself is the probable next victim.
tagline: Written, Produced, And Directed To Scare The Daylights Out Of You!
title: The Four Skulls of Jonathan Drake
